task.summary: Playlist panel also had its appearance fixed.
Server class with file sending ability added.
conflicts resolved. files receiver client class added but is still empty.
SearchBar graphics made. TODO: complete listeners and connect them.
Visual improvement!! icons for shuffle and repeat buttons added.
Shows proper error message when the song couldn't be found.
Parser was made more system independent.
Can show better graphics! songs that didnt have pics and names fixed.
naming problems fixed. some class names weren't camel case.
Bugs fixed. some pics also attached in images folder.
JpotigyGUI JFrame is no longer EXIT_ON_CLOSE. more methods added to client.
Bug fixed. when the window is closed now the song pauses.
bug fixed. FastFourierTransform class was stolen.
minor changes. field IP added to friend info class.
Server and client phase 1 successfully passed.
Server and client phase 1 successfully passed.
java doc modified. 40 mins after deadline.
oh lord guide the lost sheep to salivation...
